attributes.title: Dump Trump 2020 😻
attributes.review: The app infiltrated my precious personal data such as contacts, pictures, and apps. It changed all my contacts to “Trump 2020”, all my photos are now photo of a Trump flag, and now all my apps are deleted except for the essentials and this wretched app. One star.

attributes.title: HORRIBLE HORRIBLE APP!!!!
